T02D1907:31b-1: shr'i sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na tantr'a
T02D1907:31b-2: ta aud dhitya lo tsa n'a y'a durga ti sho
T02D1907:31b-3: dha na bi dhi:/ bod skad du /
T02D1907:31b-4: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su spyang ba'i rgyud
T02D1907:31b-5: las phyung ba spyan ma'i ngan song sbyong pa'i cho
T02D1907:31b-6: ga / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa dpal ldan
T02D1907:31b-8: lha mo spyan ma zhes bya gzhan don la //
T02D1907:31b-9: dgyes pa shi ba sos byed la btud nas //
T02D1907:31b-10: shi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1907:31b-11: shi ba mtho ris sbyar ba bshad par bya //
T02D1907:31b-12: shi ba'i bdag nyid rab dben par //
T02D1907:31b-13: dal 'byor nyer spyod kun ldan pa //
T02D1907:31b-14: me tog dkar po'i dbu rgyan 'chang //
T02D1907:31b-15: dri yang dkar pos byugs shing zhi //
T02D1907:31b-16: gos dang rgyan yang dkar ba dang //
T02D1907:31b-17: dang por yang na der mos pas //
T02D1907:31b-18: rdo rje rdo rje dril bzung ste//
T02D1907:31b-20: tsandan dkar sogs dri dang ni //
T02D1907:31b-21: bdud rtsi lnga ni chur ldan pas //
T02D1907:31b-22: kun du dkyil 'khor nyer byugs la //
T02D1907:31b-23: me tog dkar pos mdzes par bya //
T02D1907:31b-24: yon chab sogs sngags sv'a:h'a mtha' //
T02D1907:31b-25: yang dag skul byed bzla bar bya //
T02D1907:32a-2: gnyug ma bltas nas gnas sogs bsrung //
T02D1907:32a-3: de la gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1907:32a-4: aom a'a:bigh'anta kri ta h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1907:32a-5: yang na na ma:sa manta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1907:32a-6: rnal 'byor cho ga rig pas cho ga bzhin //
T02D1907:32a-7: spyan ma'i rnal 'byor rab tu byas nas ni //
T02D1907:32a-8: snying ga'i sa bon gnyug ma de las ni //
T02D1907:32a-9: grub pa yang ni yang dag spro bar bya //
T02D1907:32a-10: de yis 'jig rten pha rol song ba yi //
T02D1907:32a-11: shes pa dang zhing chags pa dgug par bya //
T02D1907:32a-12: yang na chos kyi sgo yi rnam pa ni //
T02D1907:32a-13: mar me rlung gis g-yo ba med pa bzhin //
T02D1907:32a-14: bkug nas de yi shes pa ro yi ni //
T02D1907:32a-15: spyi bo nas ni snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02D1907:32a-16: de rjes 'dug pa langs nas ni //
T02D1907:32a-17: de ni shes pa ldan par blta //
T02D1907:32a-19: de snying gti mug dga' ma gzhug / de lus stong par byas nas ni //
T02D1907:32a-20: rnam par shes pa lhag mar blta //
T02D1907:32a-21: de rjes mo ha ra ti brjod //
T02D1907:32a-22: de ni spyan ma rnam par bsgom //
T02D1907:32a-23: de yi mig sogs lus sogs la //
T02D1907:32a-24: rnam pa kun du byin brlab bya //
T02D1907:32a-25: snying ga'i ye shes lha yi ni //
T02D1907:32a-26: snying gar zla gnas rtsa sngags rgyal //
T02D1907:32a-27: lha sprin pa dud rtsi'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1907:32a-28: lag pa dang bcas bkru bar bya//
T02D1907:32a-29: rang gi lus las spros pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1907:32a-30: ma lus pa khyab pa'i 'od spros pas bsdus nas
T02D1907:32a-31: 'od kyi gong bu lta bu las spyan ma'i sprin
T02D1907:32a-32: dang de'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gang ba dang dbang
T02D1907:32a-33: bskur ba'i tshul gyis bkrus nas kyang de bzhin du
T02D1907:32a-36: lag pa gnyis la rdo rje dang dril bu'o //
T02D1907:32a-37: de'i rjes la sngags pas ku sha'i rtse mo rdo rje rtse gcig pa rnon por bsgoms la /
T02D1907:32a-38: der bcug pa lta bur rdo rje'i bug par bcug
T02D1907:32a-39: nas de'i rjes la sems mnyam par bzhag pas de'i
T02D1907:32a-40: snying gar bkod pa'i shes pa rnam par gsal ba
T02D1907:32a-41: yang dag par bskul zhing rdo rje'i 'od zer rlung
T02D1907:32a-43: 'od zer snying gnas phyung bas reg pas dngul chu lta bur gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1907:32a-44: steng gi lam nas byung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par grol ba'o //
T02D1907:32b-0: gal te shes pa lam gzhan du 'gro na 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor @32b ltung ngo //
T02D1907:32b-1: de'i phyir steng gi lam du de 'pho bar bya'o //
T02D1907:32b-2: mgo po las ni gzugs med du 'gro'o //
T02D1907:32b-3: mdzod spu nas gzugs khams zhes bya bar ro //
T02D1907:32b-4: mig gnyis las ni mi nyid du'o //
T02D1907:32b-5: rna ba gnyis las ni grub pa'i lha'i 'gro bar ro //
T02D1907:32b-6: sna bug gnyis nas ni gnod sbyin nyid du'o //
T02D1907:32b-8: lte ba las ni 'dod pa'i lhar ro //
T02D1907:32b-9: khu ba'i rtsa las ni yi dags kyi 'gro bar ro //
T02D1907:32b-10: gci ba las ni lha ma yin nam byol song gi skye gnas so //
T02D1907:32b-11: bshang lam las ni dmyal ba'i 'gro bar ro //
T02D1907:32b-12: ye shes dman pas 'gro bas na de'i phyir lam la dga' bas sbang bar bya'o//
T02D1907:32b-13: de'i phyir de thar pa'i grong khyer du gzhag par
T02D1907:32b-14: bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1907:32b-15: ga yongs su rdzogs pas sam /
T02D1907:32b-16: rdzas gcig bsreg pa'i phyogs su gsungs pa'i cho gas
T02D1907:32b-17: mchod sbyin pas byin pa thams cad rdo rje slob
T02D1907:32b-18: dpon gyis ye shes kyi me la zhi ba'i sbyin
T02D1907:32b-19: sreg bya'o // yang de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha
T02D1907:32b-20: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa theg pa chen
T02D1907:32b-21: po'i mdo lnga bklag par bya'o //
T02D1907:32b-22: de'i rjes la thams cad bsdus nas mchod sbyin byed pa las yon blang ngo //
T02D1907:32b-23: mchod sbyin byed pas kyang rang gi 'byor ba dang
T02D1907:32b-24: rjes su 'tsham pa'i gos dang rgyan dang mal stan
T02D1907:32b-25: dang khyim dang zhing dang khol po dang khol mo
T02D1907:32b-26: la sogs pa'i yon slob dpon la gus pa dang
T02D1907:32b-28: de nas shi pa 'du byed pa'i skye bo rnams
T02D1907:32b-29: kyis yi ge gsum brjod cing mchod phyir thogs bcing
T02D1907:32b-30: ngo // de nas ro khyer ba rnams 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su mos te /
T02D1907:32b-31: gdugs 'dzin pa ni lha'i rgyal po dang /
T02D1907:32b-32: rda yab 'dzin pa ni tshangs pa dang /
T02D1907:32b-33: ral gri 'dzin pa ni khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1907:32b-34: bstod pa 'don pa bde byed dang /
T02D1907:32b-35: dbu rgyan 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa gshin rje dang /
T02D1907:32b-36: bum pa 'dzin pa chu lha dang /
T02D1907:32b-37: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar 'dzin pa me lha dang /
T02D1907:32b-38: bza' ba dang ston mo 'dzin pa bden bral dang /
T02D1907:32b-39: ba dan 'dzin pa rlung lha dang /
T02D1907:32b-40: gzhan rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin la sogs par mos par bya'o //
T02D1907:32b-41: de nas yi ge brgya pa lan bdun brjod nas
T02D1907:32b-42: rang gi dge ba bla na med pa yang dag
T02D1907:32b-43: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos la ldang bar
T02D1907:33a-1: nas kyang rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje 'chang gi
T02D1907:33a-2: rang bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par mdzad pas
T02D1907:33a-4: ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D1907:33a-5: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags bzla
T02D1907:33a-7: ro yang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis drang por
T02D1907:33a-8: khyer bzhin pas nye bar dga' bas bstod pa byed
T02D1907:33a-9: bzhin pa dang lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod par
T02D1907:33a-10: blta'o // brdung dkrol sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang /
T02D1907:33a-11: rdo rje'i glu la sogs pa dril bu dang 'khar rda dang ting ting shag dang ;
T02D1907:33a-12: gling bu dang pi wang gi sgra'i rjes su 'brang bas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1907:33a-13: ba dan dang gos nam mkhar lding ba dang /
T02D1907:33a-14: kun du bgo ba mang ldan pa //
T02D1907:33a-15: dal gyis pha yi gnas thob bya //
T02D1907:33a-16: der ni bud shing 'o can skam //
T02D1907:33a-17: dge ba'i sems kyis bkod nas ni //
T02D1907:33a-18: de steng legs par bzhag nas su //
T02D1907:33a-19: bum pa 'dzin pas bkru bar bya //
T02D1907:33a-20: de nas cho ga dang ldan pas //
T02D1907:33a-21: me yis yongs su bsal bar bya //
T02D1907:33a-22: ji srid thal bar 'gyur bar du //
T02D1907:33a-23: de sbyin byed pas mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1907:33a-24: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1907:33a-25: mdo 'di sngon bzhin legs par bklag /
T02D1907:33a-26: 'khar gsil da ma ru'i rjes 'gro ba'i //
T02D1907:33a-27: rdo rje'i glu ni len du gzhug / yang na
T02D1907:33a-28: skye bo 'ga' zhig gis grol ba'i lam ma yin
T02D1907:33a-29: pa la sbyar bas mi dge ba'i phyir dang //
T02D1907:33a-30: cig shos stobs dang ldan pas lam ngan par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1907:33a-31: de'i phyir rang yang lam log par 'gro ba spangs la ;
T02D1907:33a-32: / nyi ma de nas brtsams te nyi ma brgyad
T02D1907:33a-33: la ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D1907:33a-34: pa'i cho gsang na song sbyong ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1907:33a-35: bya ba'i rim pas bya ba'o //
T02D1907:33a-36: der ji srid de'i rus pa blang ba de srid
T02D1907:33a-37: du de'i gos la de'i ming brjod pa sngon du
T02D1907:33a-39: blangs nas ji srid nyi ma brgyad kyi bar du gos der rus pa bya'o //
T02D1907:33a-40: de yang lho'i char stegs gru bzhi pa khru gang
T02D1907:33a-41: tsam la ba'i lci pas la ma lhung bas byug
T02D1907:33a-42: ba byas pa las byung bas bang sa par bya'o
T02D1907:33a-43: // der nye bar byugs nas dkyil 'khor byugs pa'i dri ma me tog la gnas bar bya'o //
T02D1907:33b-0: de'i steng du bum pa mtshan nyid dang @33b ldan pa dgod de /
T02D1907:33b-1: sman dang yal ga dang nor bu dang dri dang /
T02D1907:33b-2: 'bru lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa gdugs dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1907:33b-3: mgrin par gos sngon po dang ldan pa /
T02D1907:33b-4: nye bar skyod pa lnga dang brtsas pa /
T02D1907:33b-6: 'bab stegs kyi chu dang ldan pa /
T02D1907:33b-7: ku sha 'khyil pa byas pa'i gdan la gnas pa /
T02D1907:33b-8: rigs kyi bdag po'i rtags kyis mtshan brgya chen po lhag par gnas par byas /
T02D1907:33b-9: yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bkru'o //
T02D1907:33b-10: de nas yang mdun du 'bras dkar btags pas lte
T02D1907:33b-11: ba dang bcas pa mu khyud legs par 'bar ba
T02D1907:33b-12: dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la
T02D1907:33b-13: me tog dkar po dgod par byas nas /
T02D1907:33b-14: de'i dbus su bum pa stong pa'i steng du kham
T02D1907:33b-15: phor bum pa can gzhag / de'i rjes la kham
T02D1907:33b-16: phor der de'i rus pa ma lus pa gzhag go
T02D1907:33b-17: // ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pas phyir bzlog kyang bya'o //
T02D1907:33b-18: don grub me tog dang bcas pas rim pas rigs
T02D1907:33b-19: rnams shis pa'i tshig brjod pa dang bcas pas de'i
T02D1907:33b-20: ming ngam rus pa la des brdeg par bya'o //
T02D1907:33b-21: de nas sngags kyi tshig rnams su 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1907:33b-22: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-23: aom sarba p'a pam bi shodha na h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-24: aom sarba karm'a aa ba ra n'a ni bha smi ku ru h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-25: aom bhr'um bhr'um bi n'a sh'a ya a'a ba ra n'a ni dzam h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-26: aom bhr'um bi sho dha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-27: aom sarba karma a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-28: aom jva la dzva la dha ka dha ka ha
T02D1907:33b-29: na ha na a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat
T02D1907:33b-30: / aom srum sa ra sa ra pra sa ra
T02D1907:33b-31: pra sa ra a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat
T02D1907:33b-32: / / aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-33: aom h'um sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni spho ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-34: aom bhri ta bhri ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-35: aom tr'a tatr'a ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-37: sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-38: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tum h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-39: aom pa ce pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ti he tum h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-40: aom ma tham tha sarba t'irya ka ga ti he tum h'um phat /
T02D1907:33b-41: ces pa ni rus pa la sogs pa la me tog brdeg pa'i sngags so //
T02D1907:33b-42: de nas lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum pa'i
T02D1907:33b-43: chus de'i rus pa la sogs par brjod cing bkru'o
T02D1907:33b-45: aom na mo bha ga ba te sarba du rga
T02D1907:33b-46: ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta
T02D1907:34a-3: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
T02D1907:34a-4: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne /
T02D1907:34a-6: sarba karma a'a ba ra n'a ni bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D1907:34a-7: zhes bya ba ni rus pa la sogs pa bkru ba'i sngags so //
T02D1907:34a-8: de nas me tog gtor zhing sngags bzlas la lam bstan par bya'o //
T02D1907:34a-10: aom ratne ratne ratna sambha be /
T02D1907:34a-14: sarba p'a pam h'um tr'a ta /
T02D1907:34a-16: de nas me tog dang chu gtor zhing lam rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1907:34a-18: aom padme padme padmod bha be su kh'a ba dyam ga tstsham tu sv'a h'a /
T02D1907:34a-19: zhes bya ba ni lam rnam par sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1907:34a-20: sngags kyi tshig de dang de la bskul tshig sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1907:34a-21: lam sbyang ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi char dbab par bya'o //
T02D1907:34a-22: glu mkhan bkra shis tshigs bcad ni //
T02D1907:34a-23: mnyam par gzhag pas glur blang bya //
T02D1907:34a-24: thun gsum mam ni thun gcig tu //
T02D1907:34a-25: de bzhin nyin re bzhin du bya //
T02D1907:34a-26: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02D1907:34a-27: mchod nas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02D1907:34a-28: de la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni //
T02D1907:34a-29: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun la gcig tu phan mdzad cing //
T02D1907:34a-30: sangs rgyas skyon rnams spangs pa rnam par dag pa rtogs gyur pa //
T02D1907:34a-31: shes rab yan lag la 'khyud bde ba mdzes pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1907:34a-32: de yis khyod la dbang bskur mchog gi bkra shis
T02D1907:34a-33: 'byung bar shog / bkra shis gang zhig de yis
T02D1907:34a-34: gsungs ba dam pa chos kyi mchog / bla na
T02D1907:34a-35: med pa lha dang mi dang lha min gyis mchod
T02D1907:34a-36: cing // 'jig rten gsum du bdag med rab tu rtogs 'gyur gang yin pa //
T02D1907:34a-37: de yis khyod la dbang bskur mchog gi bkra shis
T02D1907:34a-38: 'byung bar shog / bkra shis gang zhig dam chos
T02D1907:34a-39: rab mchog rtag tu 'dzin mdzad pa //
T02D1907:34a-40: sa yi dam par son pa rgyal ba'i sras tshogs legs pa rnams //
T02D1907:34a-41: sems can phan bar mdzad la mkhas pa shin tu bkra shis pa //
T02D1907:34a-42: de yis khyod la dbang bskur mchog gi bkra shis 'byung bar shog / ces bya ba'o //
T02D1907:34a-43: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa de dag rus
T02D1907:34a-44: pa bkru pa'i dus su yang glur blang pa'am blang
T02D1907:34a-45: du gzhug go // de la gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1907:34b-0: aom @34b khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1907:34b-1: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1907:34b-2: slar yang 'byon par mdzad slad du //
T02D1907:34b-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1907:34b-5: de nas mtshan mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas nas thams cad bsdu'o //
T02D1907:34b-6: 'byor pa ci yod pas ngan song yongs su sbyong
T02D1907:34b-7: ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bas bris nas
T02D1907:34b-8: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams bya'o //
T02D1907:34b-9: slar yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyin bdag la yon bslang bar bya'o //
T02D1907:34b-10: des kyang 'byor pa dang rjes su 'tsham pa rab tu dbul lo //
T02D1907:34b-11: bkrus nas gos slob dpon la dbul lo //
T02D1907:34b-13: ro la dmigs nas gnyen rnams kyis //
T02D1907:34b-14: slob dpon la ni gang byin pa //
T02D1907:34b-15: de ni mtho ris la bzhag pas //
T02D1907:34b-16: de la sbyin par shes par bya //
T02D1907:34b-17: nyi ma bdun nas rab bshad pa'i //
T02D1907:34b-18: de yis ci 'dod nor dbul bya //
T02D1907:34b-19: de la byin pas nges par ni //
T02D1907:34b-20: bde ba can du mchod par 'gyur //
T02D1907:34b-21: gang phyir bsam gtan bya ba kun //
T02D1907:34b-22: cho gas lus ni stong byas nas //
T02D1907:34b-23: sdig pa ma lus spangs nas ni //
T02D1907:34b-24: bde ba can du nges par gnas //
T02D1907:34b-25: de rjes de yi rus pa rnam dag pa //
T02D1907:34b-26: phye ma shin tu zhib par byas nas ni //
T02D1907:34b-27: mchod pas yang dag mchod nas 'bab chu ni //
T02D1907:34b-28: shin tu rgya cher rab tu dor bar bya //
T02D1907:34b-29: yang na sa 'dzin chen po mtho ba yi //
T02D1907:34b-30: steng gi rtse mo la ni bsdad nas su //
T02D1907:34b-31: rlung gi shugs ni yongs su rgyu ba na //
T02D1907:34b-32: de dad rjes su mthun par 'phyar bar bya //
T02D1907:34b-33: shin tu drag po'i las kyi dbang gis ni //
T02D1907:34b-34: gal te bde ba can ni ma thob kyang //
T02D1907:34b-35: 'di yis ngan sod rnams ni yongs spangs te //
T02D1907:34b-36: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su 'gro bar nges //
T02D1907:34b-37: dpal ldan bzang po'i zhabs kyi padmo las //
T02D1907:34b-38: thob pa'i man ngag shin tu 'dod pa ni //
T02D1907:34b-39: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa las byung ba //
T02D1907:34b-40: shin tu yid 'ong cho ga byas pa ni //
T02D1907:34b-41: gang zhig dpal ldan gsang 'dus ma rdzogs pa //
T02D1907:34b-42: dpal ldan ngan song yongs su sbyong ba yi //
T02D1907:34b-43: rgyud las gsungs pa'i las gang yod pa yi //
T02D1907:34b-44: las de yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin //
T02D1907:35a-0: shi ba bde 'gror sbyar ba'i cho ga shin tu 'dod pa mchog tu gyur @35a * //
T02D1907:35a-1: pa zhes bya ba'i ming can dpal stong nyid ting
T02D1907:35a-2: nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1907:35a-4: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa ba dh'u t'i bee ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas dang /
